name: AboveBelow
description:
You are an explorer trapped in an alternate dimension, find the keys and restore them to their locations and survive the dangers until the alignment sets you free.

WASD to move around

C to switch view

Avoid the roaming explorers, they are not what you think and pack a mean smack,

Assets used

Advanced locomotion System v2

Medieval Dungeon Pack

Various sounds from WeLoveIndies And EpicBoom sponsored content

Some textures and assets from Tenka Clone Tutorial.

Adventure Character from epic marketplace permanently free content.
